pricing.transparencySubtitle: Why a custom quote rather than a fixed grid?
pricing.transparencyIntro: We refuse mysterious pricing. Here's what influences your chatbot's cost:

transparencyFactors.title: Chatbot complexity
transparencyFactors.description: Number of conversational scenarios, response trees, tone and style customization.

transparencyFactors.title: Required integrations
transparencyFactors.description: Connection to your tools (CRM, ERP, databases, third-party APIs) for contextual responses.

transparencyFactors.title: Conversation volume
transparencyFactors.description: The estimated number of monthly interactions determines the required infrastructure.

transparencyFactors.title: LLM token consumption
transparencyFactors.description: Each AI-generated response consumes tokens. The longer and more complex the responses, the higher the cost.

pricing.transparencyConclusion: Every quote details line by line what you're paying for. No surprises, no hidden fees.
pricing.finalCtaSubtitle: Every project is unique. Let's talk about yours to offer you a perfectly tailored solution and price.
pricing.finalCtaNote: Free quote â€¢ No commitment â€¢ Response within 48h

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about H'appi

items.question: How long does it take to deploy a chatbot?
items.answer: It depends on the project complexity. A simple chatbot can be operational in 1 to 2 weeks. A more complex project with CRM/ERP integrations typically takes 3 to 6 weeks. We set a realistic timeline together from the start.

items.question: Does H'appi replace my support agents?
items.answer: No, and that's our core philosophy. Our goal is to empower your teams, not replace them. The chatbot handles repetitive requests so your agents can focus on complex, high-value cases.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes. All data is hosted in France, in certified data centers. We are fully GDPR compliant. No data is shared with third parties. On-premise deployment is available depending on your needs.

items.question: What integrations are available?
items.answer: We custom-build connections with your existing tools: CRMs (Salesforce, HubSpot), ERPs (SAP, Oracle), messaging platforms (WhatsApp, Messenger, Teams) and e-commerce systems (Shopify, WooCommerce). Each integration is developed specifically for your project and may require collaboration from your software provider or integrator.

items.question: How does H'appi's AI work?
items.answer: Our chatbots use generative AI and natural language processing (NLP) to understand your customers' intentions. The system improves with every interaction. We customize the AI for your industry (CX, Supply Chain, etc.).

items.question: Can I try before committing?
items.answer: We offer a free initial consultation to understand your needs and present a personalized demo. Every quote is detailed and commitment-free. Contact us to discuss.

items.question: Why are you cheaper than the market?
items.answer: Our model relies on optimized cloud infrastructure, an open-source stack (no license costs), and a lean organization. We pass these savings directly to our pricing. Every quote is transparent and detailed line by line.

cta.title: Want to learn more?
cta.subtitle: A 30-minute conversation. Zero jargon. We'll tell you honestly whether H'appi is the right fit for you.
cta.note: Response within 48h. Free and detailed quote.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.headline: Democratize access to custom digital solutions and business intelligence for all companies.
vision.paragraph1: At H'appi, we envision a world where every company, regardless of size, can afford personalized applications, chatbots and websites without blowing their budget or depending on tech giants. Our vision is to break the monopoly of standardized solutions and prohibitive prices imposed by IT multinationals.
vision.paragraph2: We believe custom digital should no longer be a luxury reserved for large corporations. With H'appi, an SME can have an application as powerful as a multinational's, a website as beautiful as a Silicon Valley unicorn's, and a chatbot as smart as market leaders'... for a fraction of the usual price.
vision.paragraph3: But our ambition goes further. We want your digital solutions to become smart growth engines. Through interaction data collected by your bots and applications, we transform your initial investment into a scalable SaaS ecosystem that generates concrete business insights in customer experience (CX) and supply chain.

objective2030.title: 2030 Objective
objective2030.description: Enable <bold>1,000 companies</bold> to break free from standardized solutions and exorbitant prices, while transforming their applications into true business intelligence centers.

vision.missionHeadline: Create custom applications, chatbots and websites that evolve into business intelligence platforms.
vision.missionIntro: Concretely, at H'appi, we act on 5 fundamental pillars to transform how companies access custom digital.

pillars.title: We Build Your Custom Digital Solutions
pillars.intro: We don't sell templates. We don't offer generic "turnkey" solutions. Every H'appi project is unique because your company is unique.

items.label: Web and mobile applications
items.desc: Developed according to your vision, your business processes, your visual identity

items.label: Intelligent chatbots
items.desc: Designed to speak your language, understand your industry, and interact naturally with your customers

items.label: Professional websites
items.desc: From showcase sites to e-commerce portals, always customized, high-performing and SEO-optimized

pillars.footnote: Every project starts with a deep immersion phase in your business. We take the time to understand your needs, your users, your constraints. Then we design and develop a solution that truly reflects you.

pillars.title: We Transform Your Applications into Business Intelligence Engines
pillars.intro: Your fundamental differentiator: your H'appi solutions are not static. Once deployed and interacting with your users, we collect valuable data (with GDPR consent) to develop advanced SaaS features.

subSections.title: CX Modules (Customer Experience)
items: Behavioral analytics: understand the journey and pain points
Smart personalization: automatic recommendations
Churn prediction: identify at-risk customers
Real-time satisfaction: automatic NPS and CSAT measurement
Support automation: knowledge base-powered responses

subSections.title: Supply Chain Modules
items: Demand forecasting: volume anticipation
Stock optimization: replenishment alerts
Advanced tracking: complete visibility on your flows
Multi-stakeholder coordination: supplier/distributor synchronization
Operational analytics: real-time dashboards

pillars.footnote: You start with a custom application or bot at an optimized price. After a few months, we offer to activate these SaaS modules that transform your solution into a true business intelligence platform. You only pay for what you need.

pillars.title: We Revolutionize Market Prices
pillars.intro: We made a radical strategic choice: refuse the pricing inflation of IT giants.

items.label: Next-gen cloud infrastructure
items.desc: Equivalent performance to AWS/Azure/GCP for 40 to 60% less

items.label: Quality open-source tools
items.desc: Robust and proven technologies rather than expensive proprietary licenses

items.label: Optimized architecture
items.desc: Lightweight and high-performing architectures, drastically reducing hosting costs

pillars.footnote: Result: an H'appi solution costs 50 to 70% less than an equivalent solution on traditional infrastructure, with zero compromise on quality.

pillars.title: We Support Your Long-Term Growth
pillars.intro: We're not just a vendor who delivers a product and disappears. H'appi becomes your long-term tech partner.

items.label: Proactive suggestions
items.desc: New features based on your actual usage

pillars.title: We Guarantee Compliance, Security and Transparency
pillars.intro: All our solutions are hosted in Europe, GDPR compliant, and benefit from the highest security standards.
pillars.footnote: Your data and your customers' data are protected with the same level of rigor as the largest companies, but at accessible prices.

items: Marketplace of CX and Supply Chain modules activatable in one click
Native integrations with 50+ business tools (CRM, ERP, logistics)
Industry templates to accelerate deployments
Conquering European and North American markets
Strategic partnerships with 20+ international digital agencies
Reseller network to multiply impact
Maintaining price advantage through automation
NPS (Net Promoter Score) of 70+
Reference for optimized cloud infrastructure
Community of 3,000+ entrepreneurs and tech decision-makers
100+ free guides and resources published
200+ junior developers trained in lean practices

values.title: Our Core <highlight>Values</highlight>
values.subtitle: 8 principles that guide our every decision

items.title: Radical Customization
items.quote: Your company is unique. Your digital solutions should be too.
items.description: We categorically refuse generic templates. Every line of code is designed for YOUR business, YOUR users, YOUR goals.
items.practice: Before developing, we spend several days understanding your company. We create a co-built specification with you. Throughout development, you're involved with regular demos.

items.title: Fair and Transparent Pricing
items.quote: Custom digital should no longer be a privilege for the wealthy.
items.description: We built H'appi on a strong conviction: the prices charged by the IT industry are unjustified. The same skills can cost 50 to 70% less.
items.practice: Detailed quotes with every line explained. Disruptive pricing through our optimized infrastructure. Flexible payment adapted to SMEs. Satisfaction guarantee included.

items.title: Scalable Growth
items.quote: Today's solution becomes tomorrow's business intelligence platform.
items.description: We don't create static solutions. We build solid foundations that evolve with your company.
items.practice: Phase 1: Custom app. Phase 2: Data collection. Phase 3: Personalized recommendations. Phase 4: Activation of Ã  la carte SaaS modules.

items.title: Agility and Speed
items.quote: Waiting 6 months for an application is no longer acceptable.
items.description: Traditional cycles are endless. We deliver functional prototypes 60% faster than traditional providers.
items.practice: Kick-off within 48h. First functional version in 2-3 weeks. 1-2 week iterations. Continuous delivery rather than a "big bang" final.

items.title: Long-Term Partnership
items.quote: We're not a vendor, we're your outsourced tech team.
items.description: Too many digital projects fail because the provider delivers and disappears. At H'appi, we stay by your side.
items.practice: Every client has a dedicated contact. Responsive support during business days. Proactive maintenance. Regular strategic advice. No anonymous ticket, a real human relationship.

items.title: Uncompromising Security
items.quote: Accessible prices don't mean compromised security.
items.description: Even as we revolutionize prices, we never cut corners on security and compliance.
items.practice: European hosting. End-to-end encryption. Daily automatic backups. Quarterly security audits. ISO 27001, SOC 2 certified partners.

items.title: Radical Transparency
items.quote: You have the right to know where every euro spent goes.
items.description: Pricing opacity is a plague of the IT industry. At H'appi, we practice total transparency.
items.practice: Detailed quotes in plain language. Accessible source code (you own 100%). Open technologies. Weekly reporting with time spent.

items.title: International Excellence, Competitive Pricing
items.quote: The best technical quality at the most accessible prices.
items.description: We combine high-level expertise + optimized cloud infrastructure + lean organization to offer professional quality and disruptive pricing.
items.practice: International team with the best technologies. Costs optimized through our infrastructure choices. We charge for the real value created, not the prestige of a logo.

promise.title: Our Promise
promise.quote: At H'appi, we create digital solutions that reflect you, at prices that break market codes, and that evolve to become your competitive advantage.
promise.intro: Every line of code, every design, every feature is guided by three questions:

questions.detail: Revolutionary pricing, total transparency, flexible payment
No gimmicks, only features with positive ROI

promise.conclusion: If the answer is yes three times, we do it. Otherwise, we don't.

problem.title: The Traditional IT Industry Problem
problem.subtitle: Traditional agencies and IT service companies charge you for:
items: Overpriced cloud infrastructure (AWS/Azure/GCP with comfortable margins)
Proprietary licenses (Oracle, Microsoft, SAP... thousands â‚¬/month)
Heavy organization (salespeople, project managers, consultants...)
Bureaucratic processes (weeks of meetings and approvals)
problem.result: Result: only 30 to 40% of the budget goes to actual development.

solution.title: The H'appi Solution: Lean, Smart, Accessible

pillars.title: Next-Generation Cloud Infrastructure
pillars.description: Instead of premium pricing from major clouds, we work with innovative providers offering the same performance for 40 to 60% less.

pillars.title: Modern Open-Source Tech Stack
pillars.description: PostgreSQL, Node.js, Python, React, Next.js... No licenses, active community, regular updates.
pillars.saving: Complete elimination of license costs (20-30% of traditional budget)

pillars.title: Lean Organization and Small Team
pillars.description: No salesperson with 20% margin. No project manager without direct added value. Expert developers, integrated UX/UI designer, involved technical leadership.

pillars.title: Smart Automation and Reuse
pillars.description: Reusable components, automated CI/CD, industry templates. We capitalize on our experience.

comparison.title: Result: Revolutionary Prices
comparison.footnote: Same quality, or even superior, thanks to our technical expertise and modern technology choices.

phases.title: Custom Creation
phases.subtitle: Your Initial Investment
phases.description: Web/mobile application, intelligent chatbot or professional website. Optimized pricing (50-70% below market), premium quality, fast delivery.

phases.title: Data Collection
phases.subtitle: Automatic and GDPR-Compliant
phases.description: Behavioral data, bot interactions, business data and performance. All while respecting GDPR: consent, anonymization, right to deletion.

phases.title: Analysis and Recommendations
phases.subtitle: Free
phases.description: After 3 to 6 months, detailed report with identified behaviors, detected issues, optimization opportunities and personalized recommendations.

phases.title: SaaS Module Activation
phases.subtitle: Ã€ La Carte Upsell
phases.description: Choose only the CX and Supply Chain modules that create value for you. No long-term commitment, flexible monthly billing.

example.title: Fictional example for an e-commerce:
example.content: Imagine a 6-month analysis: 2,000+ bot interactions, 70% of questions about order status, 15% about product returns. We would recommend activating the CX Module - Smart Tracking to automate these responses and significantly reduce support requests.

Industry expertise strengthened with each project

enterprise.description2: Let's talk about your project. Custom solution, revolutionary pricing, long-term support.

talent.perks: Varied projects, modern stack, autonomy, remote possible, competitive compensation + profit sharing.

partner.description: Digital agency, cloud startup, independent consultant or investor: let's build together.

history.title: Our Story (In Brief)
history.paragraph1: H'appi was born from a simple but deep frustration: why does custom digital cost so much when technologies are increasingly accessible?
history.paragraph2: Launched in 2026, H'appi is a young startup on a mission to revolutionize market prices without compromising quality, building on:
pillars: Smart upsell model (recurring revenue on value)
history.conclusion: The adventure is just beginning. And you can be part of it.

details.title: Unique industry customization
details.description: Unlike generic platforms, H'appi creates chatbots with built-in industry knowledge from the design phase. CX terminology, Supply Chain processes, sector-specific workflows are natively understood.
items: Ready-to-use industry templates (e-commerce, B2B services, logistics)
Continuous learning of your business vocabulary
Adaptation to each client's internal processes
details.statLabel: of customer service interactions automated in France in 2025

details.title: Integration with your ecosystem
details.description1: H'appi can connect to your CRMs, ERPs, messaging tools and e-commerce platforms via API. Each connection is custom-built to fit your technical environment.*
details.description2: Companies deploy an average of 4 CX performance measurement tools. H'appi centralizes this data to deliver clear KPIs: resolution rate, customer satisfaction, average response time.
details.note: Each connection is custom-developed for your project. Integration with certain tools may require collaboration from your software provider or integrator.

details.title: The hybrid human-AI approach
details.description1: 51% of companies seek to balance human contact and technology. H'appi is designed to empower your teams, not replace them. The chatbot handles repetitive requests (up to 80% of volume) and transfers complex cases to your advisors with all the necessary context.
details.description2: Result: your agents are more efficient, your customers are better served, and your support costs decrease.

stats.label: want to balance human and technology

pageCasUsage.title: Two expertises, one single <highlight>platform</highlight>
pageCasUsage.subtitle: H'appi specializes in Customer Experience and Supply Chain, the two areas where chatbots create the most value for your business.
pageCasUsage.cxDescription: AI adoption in customer service grew from 10% in 2020 to 85% in 2025 in France. Companies that don't automate their CX are falling behind.

cxItems.title: Appointment booking
cxItems.description: The chatbot handles automated appointment scheduling, checks availability and sends confirmations.

cxItems.title: Level 1 complaint management
cxItems.description: Automatic complaint qualification, resolution of simple cases and smart escalation to your advisors.

cxItems.title: Product recommendations
cxItems.description: Through CRM integration, the chatbot offers personalized recommendations based on purchase history.

cxItems.title: After-sales support
cxItems.description: Automated technical support, interactive troubleshooting guides, returns and exchanges management.

cxItems.title: New customer onboarding
cxItems.description: Personalized guidance for new customers through your services, adapted to their profile and needs.

pageCasUsage.supplyDescription: Generative AI in logistics offers 13 identified use cases in France, from demand prediction to route optimization. H'appi integrates these capabilities into its chatbots.

supplyItems.title: Multi-carrier tracking
supplyItems.description: Unified order tracking regardless of carrier. Your customers get a clear and instant view.

supplyItems.title: Proactive delay notifications
supplyItems.description: Automatic alerts before the customer even asks. Anticipate frustrations and propose solutions.

supplyItems.title: Logistics exception management
supplyItems.description: Automated resolution of common incidents: damaged package, incorrect address, absent recipient.

supplyItems.title: Supplier/distributor coordination
supplyItems.description: Automated communication with your partner network to streamline information exchange.

supplyItems.title: Customs support and documentation
supplyItems.description: Assistance with customs procedures, required documentation and regulations for international logistics.

pageFaq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
pageFaq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about H'appi. Can't find your answer? Contact us directly.

resources.description: Complete guides, tutorials and technical documentation to get the most out of H'appi.

resources.description: Live sessions with our experts to discover best practices in conversational AI.

resources.title: Support
resources.description: Our team is available to answer all your questions. Contact by email, chat or phone.

pageAbout.subtitle: H'appi was born from a simple conviction: custom digital solutions shouldn't cost a fortune. We create solutions that reflect you and evolve to become your competitive advantage.
pageAbout.quote: At H'appi, we believe AI should empower humans, not replace them. We are a young startup and every project matters. Our strength: transparency and personalized support.

pageAbout.historyP1: Launched in early 2026, H'appi is a young startup disrupting custom digital pricing through optimized cloud infrastructure, a 100% open-source stack and a lean organization.
